text.text_translated:
An asteroid is a rock in space.
Now NASA wants to record some smaller asteroids.
They are 140 metres wide or more.
NASA thinks there are 25,000 of this size.
NASA recorded 8,000 so far.
NASA still needs to record 17,000.
In 2013, a 19-metre asteroid exploded above Chelyabinsk in Russia.
The rock hurt 1,200 people.
Asteroids this size are very dangerous if they come near Earth.
